department: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Gendarmerie royale du Canada)
description: RC EMP is looking for a part-time physician to provide medical services to RCMP members in the MB.
full_summary:
### Physician Part Time - Request for Proposal

**Request Number**: PW-23-01030081
**Solicitation Number**: M5000-23-2014/A
**Publication Date**: March 15, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 5, 2023, 4:00 PM local time

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a physician to provide onsite occupational health services to RCMP members in ‘D’ Division, Manitoba. The contract is for a period of two years with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Security Clearance**: All personnel, including the contractor, must hold a valid “Top Secret” security clearance issued by the RCMP Departmental Security.

**Key Requirements**:

- Provide onsite occupational health services to RCMP members in ‘D’ Division, Manitoba.
- The anticipated level of effort is up to 16 hours per week.
- The contractor must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
- The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

**Tendering Method**: This procurement is being conducted through an open tender process, with a Request for Proposal invited from interested suppliers. Suppliers must submit their proposals to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Key Documents**: The attached tender documents provide further information on the requirements and evaluation criteria for this request. Interested suppliers can also consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for additional information.

**Indigenous Procurement**: The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity. Suppliers are encouraged to register and increase their visibility for potential Indigenous contracting opportunities.

**Contact Information**: For any queries related to this procurement, please contact Sheena Simonson at 306-515-1563, sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.English and French versions of the tender document are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/15/03ea29ed24d09ddeb8ae5e8740a0ab97/202302014_-_rfp_-_en_-_physician_part_time_-_v01.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/15/03ea29ed24d09ddeb8ae5e8740a0ab97/202302014_-_rf
